backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing voter management system with blob storage, authorization/access control, user profiles with role-based permissions (Admin/Supervisor/Karyakarta), voter CRUD operations, and task management functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features related to restoring and verifying the navigation menu in frontend/src/App.tsx that disappeared after Version 15 deployment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling with details about navigation menu restoration, authentication flow, voter management features, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including primary color #002080 for consistent theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Voter Management System', root div, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow, restored responsive navigation menu (6 items: Dashboard, Add Voter, Voter List, Label Printing, Task Management, Analytics), header with #002080 background, mobile hamburger menu, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-screen access denied component displaying error message with shield icon, user's principal ID, and logout button for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedSearchFi: Advanced search and filter component for voters with text inputs (name, mobile, house number, voter ID) and dropdown filters (gender, caste, area, taluka, district, state) with clear filters functionality and real-time filtering.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskForm.t: A dialog form component for creating and assigning tasks with title, description, deadline, role selection, and file attachment support with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DistributionChar: A reusable chart component that displays data distribution using either bar or pie charts with tooltips, legends, and color-coded visualization.
frontend/src/components/DocumentUploadFi: A document upload field component supporting multiple PDF and JPEG files with validation, progress tracking, file preview icons, and 10MB size limit.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploadField: A single image upload field component for JPEG files with preview, progress tracking, and 5MB size limit using ExternalBlob for upload handling.
frontend/src/components/LabelPrintView.t: A print dialog component that displays voter information as address labels in a 2-column grid layout, paginated at 10 labels per page with print-specific CSS styling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: An authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component for first-time user profile setup, collecting name and role (Admin/Supervisor/Karyakarta) with form validation and submission via useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
Modal displaying full task details including title, description, assigned role, deadline, status badge, status updater, and downloadable attachments with formatted dates.
Renders color-coded badge components for task statuses (Pending/In Progress/Completed) with appropriate styling for each state.
frontend/src/components/TaskStatusUpdate: Dropdown component allowing assigned users to update task status, with role-based permission checking and optimistic UI updates with error rollback.
frontend/src/components/TaskTable.tsx: Table component displaying tasks with columns for title, description, assigned role, deadline, status badge, and attachment count; rows are clickable to open task details.
frontend/src/components/VoterDetailModal: Modal displaying comprehensive voter information including photo, signature, personal details, contact info, and downloadable educational documents in a scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/VoterEntryForm.t: Form component for adding new voters with fields for personal information, contact details, demographics, and file uploads (photo, signature, documents) using react-hook-form with validation.
frontend/src/components/VoterImportDialo: Dialog component for importing voters from CSV/Excel files with progress tracking, duplicate detection, and error handling. Parses files using parseExcelFile utility and adds voters via useAddVoter hook.
frontend/src/components/VoterTable.tsx: Table component that displays voter records with columns for serial number, name, house number, voter ID, mobile, area, taluka, gender, and caste. Includes defensive checks to ensure voters is always an array and renders empty state when no voters match filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication via Internet Identity. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddVoter.ts: Mutation hook for adding a new voter to the backend with comprehensive voter details including personal info, address, documents, and photos. Invalidates voters query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssignTask.ts: Mutation hook for assigning tasks with title, description, deadline, role assignment, and attachments. Invalidates tasks query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current user's profile with stuck-state detection and automatic re-initialization logic. Includes timeout handling and extensive debug logging for troubleshooting profile loading issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetTasks.ts: Query hook that fetches all tasks from the backend, enabled only when actor is available and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetVoters.ts: Query hook that fetches all voters from the backend with extensive debug logging. Returns combined loading state that accounts for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle. Provides status tracking and identity access throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook for saving the current user's profile to the backend. Invalidates currentUserProfile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskStatus.t: Mutation hook for updating a task's status by task ID. Invalidates tasks query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and semantic colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics dashboard page that fetches voter data and displays distribution charts for gender, caste, education, office, and area demographics with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying voter statistics cards including total voters, male/female/other voter counts with percentages, featuring loading skeletons and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LabelPrinting.tsx: Label printing page that generates printable voter address labels in a 10-per-page A4 format, with print preview and print functionality using window.print().
frontend/src/pages/TaskManagement.tsx: Task management page with role-based task filtering (Admin sees all, Supervisor sees assigned/created, Karyakarta sees assigned only), featuring task creation form and detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/VoterEntry.tsx: Simple page wrapper for the VoterEntryForm component with header and card layout for adding new voters to the system.
frontend/src/pages/VoterList.tsx: Voter list page with advanced search/filtering, CSV import/export functionality, label printing, and a data table displaying all voters with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Exports voter data to CSV format with proper escaping, UTF-8 BOM for Excel compatibility, and automatic download with timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/excelImport.ts: Parses CSV files to import voter data, handling quoted fields, validating required fields, and converting data types including Gender enum and bigint house numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme with HSL variables, border radius settings, dark mode support, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking election voter management system architecture, known issues (navigation menu disappeared, voterId BigInt conversion error), implemented features, and platform constraints (no SMS/OTP support).
